Title: Provides for immediate notification to a complainant of the service of an ex parte order of protection
Summary: Provides for immediate notification to a complainant, in the manner specified by the complainant, of the service of an ex parte order of protection.
LawCode: Add ยง530.13-a, CP L; add ยง153-d, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to notification of service of ex parte orders of protection
